casebody.data:
MASOOD
v.
OIL COMPANY, et al. No. 94A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2007. Kathrine D. Fisher, for Erwin Oil Co., et al. Leto Copeley, Raleigh, for Masood. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of March 2007 by Defendants for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Defendants (Erwin Oil Co., et al) shall have up to and including the 17th day of April 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of March 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
